pages.text: This item can help you to clear difficulty in a chunk section. To use it, place it in the desired chunk section. Right click it to activate. It will summon a hoard of enemies, and kill them all to clear chunk section difficulty. If any mob are dead for suspicious cause, The spawner will fail. You can click it to restore.
When a chunk is cleared, you can check it in your difficulty tab, or place down a hostility spawner. Spawner will turn green automatically in cleared regions.
